Author: Phil Day <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Oct 23 14:11:29 2014 +0000

    Shelve_offload() should give guests a chance to shutdown
    
    Change Iec3dfd17725440958aac395ebc471e51afd6522e added clean_shutdown
    support to shelve operations, but ignored shelve_offload as its normally called
    either as a second stage to shelve().   However BFV instances call
    shelve_offload() directly, so it too should have clean_shutdown support.
    
    Change-Id: Ida612a70ad3b8a7b7b9454579870569c4129ee48
    Closes-Bug: 1384637
    Partially-Implements: blueprint user-defined-shutdown
